description.value:
You can damage your enemy’s weapons as they strike you, sometimes to terrifying effect.

Prerequisites: Con 17

Benefit: As a reaction when a melee weapon attack hits you, you can attempt a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#sunder]{sunder combat maneuver} against the attacker, dealing damage to the weapon that hit you on a success. If the weapon gains the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.2sVSvaOrr3uLW8Uq]{broken} condition as a result of this ability, you can immediately attempt an @Check[type:intimidate] to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#demoralize]{demoralize} all foes within 60 feet. You can’t use this ability again until you spend 1 Resolve Point to regain Stamina Points after a 10-minute rest.
